attributes.action: STOP THE CHANCELLOR’S PLANS TO SCRAP THE RED DIESEL DUTY RATE !!!
attributes.additional_details:
The cost of living WILL go up there are lost of families that can’t afford to eat/live now with out the prices of vegetables etc going up up in cost .
People like showmen and women that rely on red diesel for power for electricity etc.
Building industry for plant and equipment etc I could go on all day
attributes.background:
If the chancellor scraps the duty rate on red diesel many people are going to suffer the cost of housing will go up.a list of people that will suffer.
SHOWMEN,FACTORIES,CRANE/PLANT HIRE,FARMERS BUILDING INDUSTRY ETC ETC THE LIST GO,s on and on

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300530
